SELECT sca.id, c.`name` AS curriculum_name, c.grade, sca.curriculum_id, CONCAT(st.nickname,'/',st.phone) AS teacher_name, sca.curr_start_time, sca.max_num, sca.class_place, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(sca.begin_of_select_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 至 ',DATE_FORMAT(sca.end_of_select_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) as choose_time, COUNT(scc.id) AS student_num,
CASE WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time > SYSDATE() THEN 0/*未开课*/ WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time < SYSDATE() and SYSDATE() < sca.end_of_select_time THEN 1/*开始选课*/ WHEN sca.end_of_select_time < SYSDATE() and SYSDATE() < sca.curr_start_time THEN 2/*备课中*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > sca.curr_start_time and SYSDATE() < date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL (SELECT CEILING(tc.class_hours/count(ts.id))*7 from hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca on tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id left join hklk_school_syllabus ts on tsca.id = ts.sca_id where tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id) DAY ) THEN 3/*开始上课*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL (SELECT CEILING(tc.class_hours/count(ts.id))*7 from hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca on tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id left join hklk_school_syllabus ts on tsca.id = ts.sca_id where tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id) DAY ) THEN 4/*已结束*/ END as apply_status
, concat(group_concat(h.week_type),'|',max(h.class_time)) class_time FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id LEFT JOIN hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc ON sca.id = scc.sca_id left join hklk_school_syllabus h on sca.id = h.sca_id WHERE sca. STATUS = 3 and sca.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%')
GROUP BY sca.id

SELECT sca.id,c.`name` as curriculum_name,sca.curriculum_id,hs.name as school_name,c.grade,st.nickname as teacher_name,sca.begin_of_select_time,sca.end_of_select_time,sca.max_num,COUNT(scc.id) as student_num, CASE WHEN sca.end_of_select_time< now() or sca.max_num = COUNT(scc.id) THEN 1 else 0 end is_sign,sca.order_remark FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id left join hklk_school hs on hs.id = sca.school_id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id LEFT JOIN hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc ON sca.id = scc.sca_id where sca.status in (2,3)
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{queryParam}, '%')
and sca.order_op_user_id is null
and sca.order_op_user_id is not null
GROUP BY sca.id

SELECT ss.*,scc.pay_state,h.name as class_name FROM hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_student ss ON scc.student_id = ss.id left join hklk_school_class h on ss.class_id = h.id where scc.sca_id = #{scaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
